participant_1.background: i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.background: i like riding horses. i will graduate from high school in two years. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i'm a vegan. i've brown curly hair.
